definition[0]: to not include someone or something, either deliberately or because you forget to do it
example[0]: Please don’t omit any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
example[1]: Lisa’s name had been omitted from the list of honor students.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say leave out rather than omit:
example[2]: Please don’t leave out any details, no matter how trivial they may seem.
